properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:26PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall from today is causing additional rises along the
Tombigbee River, and additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is
forecast over the next 24 hours. Levels are currently forecast to
rise to near or above moderate flood stages. Interests should
closely monitor the latest river forecasts through the week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 7:15 PM Monday the stage was 75.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 83.9 feet by
Saturday evening.  Additional rises may be possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 84 feet...Some industrial and residential flooding
begins just upstream from Demopolis Dam at 88 feet. Widespread
flooding in Greene...Marengo...and Sumter counties occurs and some
evacuations may be necessary.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
